abilities.name: Double Slam
about: Performs a slam with both weapons, dealing heavy physical damage

abilities.name: Sceptre Toss
about: Goes airborne and tosses a weapon in each hand twice, dealing physical damage in a large area twice

abilities.name: Spectral throw
about: Throws a sceptre forward

abilities.name: Circle blast
about: Deals area of effect damage in an area

abilities.name: Crossed swords
about: Spawns seven tentacled swords which surround the player, which each of them firing a shot towards the center of the circle

abilities.name: Bladestorm
about: Calls down a flurry of weapons targeting the player multiple times, which land and deal damage

abilities.name: Animated Weapons
about: Fires a wave of projectiles that transform into animated weapons, which can be killed

abilities.name: Dash
about: Dashes forward while dealing damage

abilities.name: Strafe Shot
about: Dashes sideways while firing multiple arrows

abilities.name: Charged shot
about: Charges up an shot from his bow and fires

abilities.name: Arrow volley
about: Large frontal cone that fires multiple arrows several times, firing in varied patterns

abilities.name: Combo Rush
about: Performs a melee attack twice, then jumps backwards and fires multiple lines of arrows at the ground

abilities.name: Sundering Shot
about: Goes airborne and fires an arrow straight down, which split into eight projectiles that travel across the ground

abilities.name: Mirror Arrow
about: Disappears and fires multiple mirror arrows

abilities.name: Crippling Vines
about: While not moving, you will receive a stacking Crippling Vines debuff which slows movement speed

abilities.name: Knife Toss
about: Throws knives forward that fan out left or right

abilities.name: Sidestep Knife Toss
about: Dashes sideways and throws multiple knives a short distance forward at the ground, which then explode

abilities.name: Backstep Knife Toss
about: Backsteps and throws multiple knives a short distance in a line forward at the ground, which then explode to deal damage

abilities.name: Knife Barrage
about: Jumps up and throws many knives at the ground in a cone pattern, then slams down to deal heavy physical damage, which is immediately followed by the knives detonating

abilities.name: Obsidian Golems
about: Each golem attack with Fire projectiles

abilities.name: Lightning blasts
about: Winds up and fires 2 or 3 lightning blasts that can overlap

abilities.name: Lightning tendrils
about: Channeling spell that releases surges of lightning damage in quick succession in an arc, with every fourth surge dealing more damage

abilities.name: Storm Cloud
about: The Eradicator becomes enveloped in a storm cloud which deal constant damage while touched

abilities.name: Storm Bolts
about: Shortly after enveloping into storm cloud The Eradicator will then launch a storm bolt three times, followed by three storm bolts in rapid succession

abilities.name: Super Lightning Tendrils
about: The Eradicator goes airborne and fires many small blasts of lightning at you. Most of them will land underneath him, while several are aimed towards you.

abilities.name: Transform
about: The Eradicator transforms into a ball of electric tentacles then moves randomly around the map firing lightning balls. These lightning balls deal damage when touched and at the end of their duration turn into adds
